========================
API of the PaSam Package
========================

The :mod:`pasam` package is organized into the modules 'Lattice', 'Sampling',
and 'Utilities':

Lattice
=======
.. automodule:: pasam.lattice
   :members:

Sampling
========
.. automodule:: pasam.sampling
   :members:

Utilities
=========
.. automodule:: pasam.utils
   :members:
